column4: how do i find commands i want to start beryl and ktorrent on boot?
menu > system> prefs > sessions : add them there, donT' forget to save sessons
i dont know what the commands are for the programs though, how do i find that out?
in linux, generaly,  the commands to start progs are just their names,   so ktorrent, and whatever the other one is,    no path needed,  you can try them out in the terminal first
